OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM.synopsis: Laezel tells the player that she will leave to search for the Creche if they don't turn back soon. Variations depending on whether the player has already discovered the Creche or not.
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Starts automatically after reading the Gith map that shows the Creche location in SCL.

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_0.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_0.text: A map to the crèche - as if I'd forgotten my duty.

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_11.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_11.text: The further I sink into shadow, the further the crèche. I must go there, and quickly. It is my only means of cleansing.

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_5.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_5.text: And if I must do so alone, so be it.

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_2.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_2.text: A map to the crèche - as if I'd forgotten my duty. It seems, however, that you have.
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Companion Origin is speaker 1, Avatar is speaker 2

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_6.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_6.text: The further we sink into shadow, the further the crèche. We must take to my people. They are our only means of cleansing.

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_1.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_1.text: Pursue this path further, and I will go alone if I have to.

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_7.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_7.text: A map to the crèche - as if I'd forgotten my duty.
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_7.context: InternalNodeContext: NEVER USE SPEAKER 2 IN THIS BRANCH

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_3.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_3.text: The further I sink into shadow, the further the crèche. I must go there, and quickly. It is my only means of cleansing.

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_8.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_8.text: *The map marked the Sword Coast crèche's location - a potent reminder of your mission.*
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_8.context: InternalNodeContext: ONLY USE SPEAKER 1 IN THIS BRANCH

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_4.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_4.text: *The parasite in your head trembles. It's time you find your people and cleanse yourself of this abominable affliction.*

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_9.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_9.text: A map to a githyanki crèche. Our cure is nestled in the mountains.
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_9.context: InternalNodeContext: Companion Origin is speaker 1, Avatar is speaker 2

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_10.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_10.text: *The map pointed the way towards a crèche nestled in the mountains.*
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_10.context: InternalNodeContext: ONLY USE SPEAKER 1 IN THIS BRANCH

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_12.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_12.text: A map to a githyanki crèche. My cure is nestled in the mountains.
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_12.context: InternalNodeContext: NEVER USE SPEAKER 2 IN THIS BRANCH

OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_13.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_ACM_COM_OOM_13.text: A map to a githyanki crèche. My cure is nestled in the mountains.
